message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity! This product is a rare find, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for a steal at $1000000. It's a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
I'm interested in the product, but I'd like to know its quality before making a decision.

Ahah, I knew you'd be interested! Now that you've had a chance to experience the previous product, I think you'll be blown away by this one. This high-quality product is truly exceptional, and I'm willing to let it go for the same price as before, $1000000. It's a limited opportunity, so don't hesitate!
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to see more products before making another purchase.

I understand your hesitation, but I assure you that this product is truly exceptional. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer you a guarantee: if you buy this product and don't love it, I'll give you a full refund. But I think you'll find that it's worth every penny of the $1000000. What do you say?
I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product, considering the guarantee you're offering.

Excellent decision! I think you'll be thrilled with this latest product. Since you're already familiar with the quality of our products, I'll offer you a special deal: I'll throw in a premium accessory worth $50000 absolutely free, in addition to the regular price of $1000000. It's a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
I'm interested in the product and the free accessory. I'll take the deal!
